BIC: Master?

Like-Like was still near the Maximal base when he recieved th=
e message from Magmatron.

Like-Like: Master...leaving again? Don't leave L=
ike-lIke again, master! Why!? Why!?

Like-Like's vision goes blurry and he =
collapses to the ground...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: dachande=
 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, March 05, 2001 1:16 AM
  Su=
bject: Here it is. Good-Bye Destrons.


  ::Magmatron::
   
      Magmatron=
 finished the device he had been working on since he had gotten to the beas=
t wars. It was a transdimensional gateway. The only signatures that could g=
o through were Destron signatures.
      Magmatron took direct control over=
 the Queen, his ultimate creation. She called her minions back to the Sulac=
o. Then she walked through the gateway, dissappearing into the dimension of=
 Magmatron's choice.
      He hit a few more buttons and set the Sulaco to =
destroy any opening in the mountain. This was nobody would get in to find h=
is research, and since only a few people would know of the Sulaco he wouldn=
't worry. He then sent a comm to Zardus.
      "Alliance Commander Zardus,"=
 He started. "I am dropping out of this war. I am sending a download of all=
 my finding on this planet, and how to use them to your advantage, I wish y=
ou luck, and when I return I hope to find that you have the utmost advantag=
e. Good-Bye."
      The transmission ended with the sending of the download=
ed information. It contained all the information regarding the Xenomorph DN=
A, how to graft it onto an existing warrior. And it was sent triple encoded=
, tight beam sucrity line, directly to the Iron Fist's command room.
      =
The Destrons were all now returning to the Sulaco. Dachande had stayed behi=
nd, he still had business to take care of. Now that they were all onboard t=
hey all walked through the gateway. Jynx, Praetorian, Cerberus, Obitus, Fam=
e, Bellum, AEger. They all went to the new dimension.
      "Destrons, if y=
ou want to stay on earth, well, then you need to leave the Sulaco within th=
e next 20 minutes, or else you will be stuck," Magmatron broadcast to all D=
estron units, in the feild or at base. 
      Then he turned and faced the =
Gateway. He started to step through, then remembered something. He grabbed =
his data tracks that had everything they knew about Prime and the Autobots.=
 Then he stepped through. The Gateway shut down behind him, only able to be=
 activated by his hand. He saw his new home, it was a great place, huge, wi=
th many new worlds to conqure. He would be happy here.

        Yahoo! Grou=
ps Sponsor 
       
       

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the =
Yahoo! Terms of Service.
